dc.title: HEASARC: ASCA X-ray Astronomy Data - Guest Observer Facility
dc.description: The primary responsibility of the ASCA Guest Observer Facility is to enable U.S. astronomers to make the best use of the ASCA x-ray mission, in close collaboration with the Japanese ASCA team.
